author: Aditya Anand
title: Goa extends helping hand to stranded foreign visitors
description: Relief flights take hundreds home, others get food, essential supplies from the police
content:
Amidst the COVID-19 outbreak and the resultant 21-day lockdown, Goa is doing all it can for the 1,000-plus tourists stranded in the coastal State.
